Stinging Rebuke.name: Stinging Rebuke
Stinging Rebuke.fullText:
Steel Ego Attack 11Stinging Rebuke

Your enemy realizes its mistake in attacking when you react to its aggression with a swift strike.

Encounter        Augmentable, Psionic, Weapon
Immediate Reaction      Melee 1

Trigger: An enemy adjacent to you attacks you or your ally with a melee or a close attack

Target: The triggering enemy

Attack: Constitution vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, the range of your mind spike power increases to 10, but it remains a melee power. In addition, you can use your mind spike power as a free action once before the start of your next turn.

Augment 2

Hit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 60.
Stinging Rebuke.flavor: Your enemy realizes its mistake in attacking when you react to its aggression with a swift strike.
Stinging Rebuke.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you attacks you or your ally with a melee or a close attack
Stinging Rebuke.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Stinging Rebuke.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the range of your mind spike power increases to 10, but it remains a melee power. In addition, you can use your mind spike power as a free action once before the start of your next turn.

Fear and Loathing.name: Fear and Loathing
Fear and Loathing.fullText:
Steel Ego Attack 20Fear and Loathing

As you attack your foe, you bring the full force of your personality against it. The psychic assault rips through your foe’s nerves.

Daily        Fear, Psionic, Psychic, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Constitution vs. Fortitude

Hit: 4[W] + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target provokes opportunity attacks whenever it makes melee attacks (save ends).

Miss: Half damage, and the target provokes opportunity attacks whenever it makes melee attacks before the end of your next turn.

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can use a free action to slide the target 1 square whenever it is hit by an opportunity attack.


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 60.
Fear and Loathing.flavor: As you attack your foe, you bring the full force of your personality against it. The psychic assault rips through your foe’s nerves.
Fear and Loathing.onHit: 4[W] + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target provokes opportunity attacks whenever it makes melee attacks (save ends).
Fear and Loathing.onMiss: Half damage, and the target provokes opportunity attacks whenever it makes melee attacks before the end of your next turn.
Fear and Loathing.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can use a free action to slide the target 1 square whenever it is hit by an opportunity attack.

Forceful Contempt.name: Forceful Contempt
Forceful Contempt.fullText:
Steel Ego Utility 12Forceful Contempt

Through mental force, you will your flesh to become as hard as steel to foil an attack against you.

Encounter        Psionic
Immediate Interrupt      Personal

Trigger: You are hit by an attack that targets a defense other than Fortitude

Effect: The attack instead targets your Fortitude, and you gain a +2 power bonus to Fortitude until the end of your next turn.


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 60.
Forceful Contempt.flavor: Through mental force, you will your flesh to become as hard as steel to foil an attack against you.
Forceful Contempt.trigger: You are hit by an attack that targets a defense other than Fortitude
Forceful Contempt.effect: The attack instead targets your Fortitude, and you gain a +2 power bonus to Fortitude until the end of your next turn.
